fields.name: dovecot
fields.command: apt-cache policy dovecot-imapd | sed -n '2 p' | cut -f 4 -d ' ' | cut -d '-' -f 1

fields.name: postfix
fields.command: apt-cache policy postfix | sed -n '2 p' | cut -f 4 -d ' ' | cut -d '-' -f 1

fields.name: apache
fields.command: apt-cache policy apache2 | sed -n '2 p' | cut -f 4 -d ' ' | cut -d '-' -f 1

fields.name: bind
fields.command: apt-cache policy bind9 | sed -n '2 p' | cut -f 4 -d ' ' | cut -d '-' -f 1

fields.name: mongodb
fields.command: export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8; export LANG=en_US.UTF-8; export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8; export LANG=en_US.UTF-8;  echo $(sudo mongod --version | grep -Po '(\d+\.)+\d+' -m 1 )

fields.name: openssl
fields.command: apt-cache policy openssl | sed -n '2 p' | cut -f 4 -d ' ' |  cut -d '-' -f 1

fields.name: openvpn
fields.command: apt-cache policy openvpn | sed -n '2 p' | cut -f 4 -d ' ' | cut -d '-' -f 1

fields.name: openssh
fields.command: apt-cache policy openssh-server | sed -n '2 p' | cut -f 4 -d ' ' |  cut -d '-' -f 1
